1.name: Shane
1.description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

2.name: Roman Holiday
2.description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

3.name: Peter Pan
3.description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

4.name: From Here to Eternity
4.description: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

5.name: Kiss Me Kate
5.description: An ex-husband and wife team star in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew'; off-stage, the production is troublesome with ex-lovers' quarrels and a gangster looking for some money owed to them.

6.name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
6.description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

7.name: The Desert Song
7.description: Shiek Yousseff, poses as a friend of the French while secretly plotting to overthrow them. Apposing Yousseff are the Riffs, whose secret leader, The Red Shadow, is Paul Bonnard, a professor...                See full summary »

8.name: Tôkyô monogatari
8.description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city; but the children have little time for them.

9.name: The War of the Worlds
9.description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

10.name: Stalag 17
10.description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

11.name: Le salaire de la peur
11.description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

12.name: Invaders from Mars
12.description: A young boy learns that space aliens are taking over the minds of earthlings.

13.name: How to Marry a Millionaire
13.description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

14.name: House of Wax
14.description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

15.name: The Wild One
15.description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

16.name: A Day to Remember
16.description: A group of men from a London pub are going on a darts team outing to Boulogne. Various members of the party have different reasons for going and get involved in various adventures.

17.name: Calamity Jane
17.description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

18.name: Beat the Devil
18.description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

19.name: Niagara
19.description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

20.name: The Moon Is Blue
20.description: Two aging playboys are both after the same attractive young woman, but she fends them off by claiming that she plans to remain a virgin until her wedding night. Both men determine to find a way around her objections.

21.name: Julius Caesar
21.description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar, but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

22.name: Ugetsu monogatari
22.description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

23.name: Fear and Desire
23.description: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

24.name: The Big Heat
24.description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

25.name: Sommaren med Monika
25.description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

26.name: Malta Story
26.description: In World War II, the island of Malta, strategically located and vital to supply lines in the Mediterranean Sea, is fiercely attacked by the Germans, but staunchly defended by the British.

27.name: City That Never Sleeps
27.description: Johnny Kelly, who plans on resigning from the police force and leaving his wife the next day, has a very eventful last night on duty.

28.name: Hondo
28.description: Army despatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

29.name: Mogambo
29.description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

30.name: Gunsmoke
30.description: A young gun slinger tries to help a rancher and his daughter, save their land and cattle from an evil, wealthy land owner.

31.name: The Robe
31.description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

32.name: The 5,000 Fingers of Dr. T.
32.description: A young boy travels to an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.

33.name: Pickup on South Street
33.description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

34.name: Dream Wife
34.description: A business tycoon decides to wed a Middle Eastern princess whose customs dictate the pair must live apart for several months before marrying; even more complications settle in when the tycoon's ex-fiancée is assigned to chaperone the pair.

35.name: It Came from Outer Space
35.description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

36.name: The Band Wagon
36.description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

37.name: Titanic
37.description: An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

38.name: Glen or Glenda
38.description: A psychiatrist tells two stories: one of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda), the other of a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

39.name: I vitelloni
39.description: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

40.name: I Confess
40.description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

41.name: Angel Face
41.description: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

42.name: Les vacances de Monsieur Hulot
42.description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation, where he accidentally (but good-naturedly) causes havoc.

43.name: The Hitch-Hiker
43.description: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

44.name: Lili
44.description: An orphaned young woman becomes part of a puppet act and forms a relationship with the anti-social puppeteer.

45.name: Dangerous Crossing
45.description: When a beautiful bride boards an ocean liner with her new husband, he goes into hiding, and she becomes the target of a murder conspiracy.

46.name: The Story of Three Loves
46.description: An anthology film consisting of three very different stories about love set in Europe and told in flashback.

47.name: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
47.description: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

48.name: Far til fire
48.description: Denmarks most popular film family is ready. Ole has some problems at school and Søs feels like she has to take action, but her actions doesn't come without consequences

49.name: Innocents in Paris
49.description: A selection of passengers catch the plane from London for an early 1950's weekend in Paris. The Scotsman in his kilt, the elderly lady painter, the international negotiator, and the pretty ...                See full summary »

50.name: The Naked Spur
50.description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.
